      • stencilStrict

        public final boolean stencilStrict()
        Enable or disable strict mode. If strict mode is enabled, then attempting to enable stencil writing/testing will fail with an exception if the currently bound framebuffer does not have a stencil buffer.
        Specified by:
        stencilStrict in interface JCGLStencilStateType
        Returns:
        true iff strict mode is enabled
